about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: A Platform for Connected Healthcare
about.description: MediConnect is a digital platform that connects patients, doctors, and healthcare centers to provide fast and organized care. It simplifies appointments, communication, and access to records, creating a clearer, more human, and efficient medical experience.

users.title: Made for you, just what you need
users.subtitle: Designed for Every Role in Healthcare
users.description: Features tailored to the needs of patients, doctors, and healthcare centers.

patient.title: Patients
benefits: Book your medical appointments in seconds.
Check your medical history from any device.
Access doctors, specialties, and centers in one place.

doctor.title: Doctors
doctor.description: Organize your medical practice and start attending with ease.
benefits: Manage your schedule and availability in real time.

how.title: How does it work?
how.subtitle: A simple, clear, and connected process
how.description: Designed to guide you step by step, providing comfort and confidence from the first action to the final confirmation.

steps.title: Register easily
steps.description: Create your account in seconds and complete your basic information to start using the platform without complications.

steps.title: Find your medical service
steps.description: Search for specialties, doctors, or nearby centers. Use simple filters to locate exactly the service you need.

steps.title: Book your appointment
steps.description: Choose the date, time, and type of care. Confirm your appointment and receive automatic notifications on your device.

steps.title: Attend your consultation
steps.description: Attend your consultation in person or connect to your teleconsultation from the app with a single click, according to the selected modality.

functionality.title: Features
functionality.subtitle: Smart, clear, and connected solutions
functionality.description: Designed to offer modern tools that elevate medical care and make the entire process more efficient and secure.

cards.title: Direct Chat with Doctors
cards.description: Secure and private messaging with your doctors. Resolve doubts quickly without needing an appointment.

cards.title: Digital Medical History
cards.description: All your medical history in one place. Access your results, prescriptions, and analyses whenever you need them.

cards.title: Find Doctors by Location
cards.description: Find specialized doctors near you with our intelligent location-based search.

cards.title: Real-Time Teleconsultations
cards.description: Consult with doctors from anywhere and anytime, without waiting or traveling.

items.name: Immediate Access
items.description: Connect with doctors and specialists whenever you need, without long waits or complicated processes. MediConnect brings healthcare closer to your daily life.

items.name: Smart Savings
items.description: Reduce costs and time by avoiding unnecessary travel, calls, and in-person procedures. The entire medical process is managed in one place.

items.name: Centralized History
items.description: All your clinical information is stored in an organized and secure way, allowing quick access anytime and from any device.

items.name: Continuous Care
items.description: Maintain medical follow-up before, during, and after each consultation, ensuring constant and personalized care.

items.name: Secure Communication
items.description: Exchange messages, documents, and medical instructions through protected channels that respect patient privacy and confidentiality.

items.name: Accurate Decisions
items.description: Access to complete and updated data allows professionals to offer more accurate diagnoses and treatments.

items.name: Optimized Management
items.description: Doctors and health centers can efficiently manage appointments, records, and schedules, improving productivity.

items.name: Reliable Experience
items.description: An intuitive, modern, and stable platform that builds trust for both patients and healthcare professionals.
